body:
Finally got ShadowPlay to work (I'm lazy) and I recorded a 1v1 on Kohi just for a test. Give me any thoughts? I will be adding music and be talking in the future though.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n29LPX_PiOk&feature=youtu.be

I have no idea if the quality will go up to 720p (which I selected on the settings) but atm it's at 360p.

I would also LOVE some tips on how to make the quality better.

EDIT: 720p now ;D

title: My First Video!
